upright.name: Mother of Creation
upright.description: At the end of your turn, create a 1/1 Nature Spirit token with 'When this dies, gain 1 life'

reversed.name: Overwhelming Growth
reversed.description: At the end of your turn, create a 2/2 Thorn Beast token. All tokens cost 1 life to maintain.

body.raw:
# The Empress

The divine mother, The Empress nurtures all creation with boundless love and abundance, bringing life to barren lands.

*"From the fertile void, all life springs eternal."*

The Empress represents femininity, beauty, nature, and abundance. She creates board presence through tokens while protecting your forces.
